name: Labyrinth of Fate
description:
In those strange labyrinthes, you are a ball. A simple ball, with... Nothing in particular. 

Well, it seems so. Actually, you were turned into a ball while you were trying to save someone dear to you. So... Catch the magic cubes. And maybe you will be able to save this person at the end. It's up to you. 

This game is curently under construction. This version is a basic demo, created to offer you a small glimpse at the gameplay features thought for the game. 

If you enjoy the demo, please stay tuned for the next updates.
